page.title: 18Plains Farm Social Club
page.content: The{Plains Farm Social Club}was opened on 23rd December, 1967. At present (1985) there are 999 members. Many groups meet in the club including the{Leek Club}and the{Pigeon Club. Since it was opened a snooker and games room have been added. The club also has a successful football team which is a member of the C.I.U. league. Working men's clubs, like the one at Plains Farm, were very popular in the 1970s. Although the Plains Farm Social Club still has a large membership, other clubs in the area have had to close down.
